mapper.insert: insert into orderitem (id, onum, uid, productid, productname, productimage, currentprice, quantity, totalprice, createtime, updatetime) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{onum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{productid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{productname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productimage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{currentprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update orderitem set onum = #{onum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, productid = #{productid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, productname = #{productname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, productimage = #{productimage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, currentprice = #{currentprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, totalprice = #{totalprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, onum, uid, productid, productname, productimage, currentprice, quantity, totalprice, createtime, updatetime from orderitem where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, onum, uid, productid, productname, productimage, currentprice, quantity, totalprice, createtime, updatetime from orderitem
